name: llamalinecomplete
description: llama.cpp powered inline code completion for VS Code

llama-lite.endpoint.description: URL of the llama.cpp server infill endpoint

llama-lite.api_key.description: API key for the llama.cpp server (if required)

llama-lite.n_prefix.description: Number of prefix lines to send to the model

llama-lite.n_suffix.description: Number of suffix lines to send to the model

llama-lite.n_predict.description: Maximum number of tokens to predict

llama-lite.ring_n_chunks.description: Number of chunks to keep in the ring buffer context

llama-lite.max_line_suffix.description: Max characters after cursor for automatic trigger (noise reduction)

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
